_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Five qualities of a senior mendicant [an: Attained the textual analysis of meaning
Attained the textual analysis of text
Attained the textual analysis of terminology
Attained the textual analysis of eloquence
Skilled and tireless in a diverse spectrum of duties for their spiritual companions, understanding how to go about things in order to complete and organize the work.
